head.title: World Briefing | Asia: Afghanistan: Blast Kills 5 U.N. Workers

hedline.hl1: World Briefing | Asia: Afghanistan: Blast Kills 5 U.N. Workers

block.p: A bomb planted in the road exploded under a United Nations car in the southern city of Kandahar on Tuesday, killing four security guards from Nepal and their Afghan driver. The five men were contractors working for the United Nations Office of Project Services, a support agency that has worked on large projects in Afghanistan, including running elections. The explosion tore apart the vehicle and burned the men inside.
